item.title: Pythonic way of count
item.description: Writing code in a clean way differs in every language. Python also has its own style. Additionally, python is famous about its one-liners. Pythonic way is an approach of how to use the language and how to take adventage of its syntax and semantic. Python can give a very elegant way of one-liners to achieve something that most of the languages can do, but not as short and still readable way as python does it.
